attributes.action: Ban the production and sale of disposable E-Cigarettes
attributes.additional_details:
We are facing a climate crisis, new disposable inventions need to face more review and consideration before they hit the market. 

These disposable e-cigarettes are also putting all people at risk of developing nicotine addiction which could lead to more actual smoking in the future.
attributes.background: An urgent review and potential ban of the sale and distribution of the ever growing and popular disposable e-cigarettes brands.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592405
